website_summaries.verdict: Astro Gaming's on-ear A38 headphones combine a stylish design, Bluetooth connectivity, and noise cancellation, although the latter isn't quite as impressive as competitors' versions of the technology.
cons: Doesn't block out as much sound as competitors

customer_reviews.title: CATION! "DO NOT BUY!"
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a birthday gift for my daughter. I also purchased separately the customized mod kit covers for $20. The A38 headset broke right out of the box. Very cheaply made. Although Amazon was very accommodating with a speedy refund and pickup, the price does not match the quality. Now I'm left with the mode a useless A38 mod kit. Astro makes such good quality products but with these the sound being subpar at best and the build quality as poor as can possibly be, I would recommend you bypass this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Benamin Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: They’re probably gonna break sadly
customer_reviews.text: These seemed like they were going to be REALLY GREAT except for the fact that the first set I got came broken where the speaker attaches to the headphones. No biggie because they sent out a new one ASAP and we received it next day!! Sad part is the NEW pair broke in the same exact place almost a month to the day😠 too late to send back. Just gonna take it as a loss. They were a gift but the recipient still loves them and just has them taped together while he uses them. Should have to do that with a product that’s less than 6 months old😐
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ro

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pair of wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I say "wireless headphones" because as soon as you enable the microphone, the sound quality goes way down. I don't mean there's some static or sounds tinny or like the other people are muffled, I mean all of the above and then some. A $10 pair of headphones has better sound quality than this when the microphone is enabled, albeit that $10 pair would be wired. The sound quality when the microphone is off, however, is amazing for a wireless headset. As a pair of headphones this would've gotten 5 stars. If you're really going to buy this headset, I suggest keeping the microphone off and using an external attachment like ModMic or a desktop microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Mobile Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a week or so, but it's become my go-to headset for SFF gaming (Vita, mobile, etc). I like the sound, I like the feel, I like the easy to use buttons, I like the look and feel. My only concern is with build quality and it's only a potential quality based on what other reviewers have posted. So I'll keep treating it with kid gloves and hope it lasts me for a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Palmer

customer_reviews.title: better than BEATS!
customer_reviews.text: I know lots of people will bash me with comments, don't care ! I like how I can plug the Astro A38's into my MAC ( Micro USB cable included ) an use Astro's interface to change the settings to my liking!
customer_reviews.author: NetWorkPro

customer_reviews.title: These are great, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are great, worth the money. They are extremely comfortable and can easily be worn for many hours without discomfort. The sound can get very high, and there is a little bit of sound leak (i.e. people can hear sound outside of headphones, very faintly) at highest volume settings. On the bumpy parts of a bus ride, you can feel them shake around a little. I had an issue using these with my MacBook pro. I experienced a lot of sound cutting in and out but someone else's review fixed that for me. The steps to fix it were 1) Turn off wifi 2) connect headset 3) turn wifi back on. I haven't had any more problems.
customer_reviews.author: Nato

customer_reviews.title: Buyer-Beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware. On both the first and replacement headphones I got they broke at the exact same place (the part the connects the ear cup to the headphone) when I opened the package. This is a defective product. I am not sure why Amazon continues to sell them.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these headphones because I absolutely loved the first pair I had when they first came out. I used them for several year until they began to fall apart. All 3 of the ones I bought from this listing developed a very loud crakeling, static sound with in a month of use. Very disappointed in ASTRO.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Looking, Arrived Broken from Manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t want to believe the reviews, the headset looked awesome online. Arrived with box and everything in perfect condition, opened up to see that they were broken in the exact same spot the reviews had stated. I wish it would of been different but it is what it is. I thought Astro was a decent brand, Requested Refund.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Terrible headphone, so don't be fooled by the cheap price
customer_reviews.text: The headphone is broken upon arrival. An awful design overall, the earpiece connections are so thin and fragile. I mean it would break if you toss it on the couch, so don't think about dropping it on the floor. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Vo

customer_reviews.title: Decently comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Typically, I prefer over the ear headphones to the on-ear variants. These, however, are quite comfortable for day to day use.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!! Minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I have with this product is the long charge time. I love everything about it otherwise!! Very comfortable on head and great audio no matter what your listening too.
customer_reviews.author: Jake G

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty loud which is good for music but couldn't get my switches sound to come thru them but other then that good for music and youtube reasons
customer_reviews.author: UndertaleSans

customer_reviews.title: look nice
customer_reviews.text: Honestly pretty good but the cheap plastic broke literally the first time i went to put them on
customer_reviews.author: Robert Haviland

customer_reviews.title: Don't!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it, the beep when adjusting the volume or turning on/off the headset will probably damage your hearing. The noise cancellation is really good. The volume is good as well. The mic is horrible most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed S.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived broken. Better add the time and cost of sending it back to the original price!
customer_reviews.author: No One

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETE GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage sound do not buy this item it is crap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: They quit working after a month!!! Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Migdalia Morales

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Headphones - Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a replacement but overall I love these headphones! They are top quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Stottmeister

customer_reviews.title: usually broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: right side was broken off when i got it. i understand why they took it off the astro site even but its still good for music. just slap some gorilla glue in it and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I used them for 6 years with no problems
customer_reviews.text: I have had a38 for around 6 years I use them every for 8 hours + and have never had a problem with them
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Works good, easy Bluetooth pair
customer_reviews.text: I connect with my Samsung Tv, easy, works good, now I can watch the TV with out problems with my wife. Easy Bluetooth pair.
customer_reviews.author: Galo Serrano Abad

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair, I bought them when they first came out and I don’t regret getting a second pair. They’re great for the quality and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as impressive as the A50's but these are also half the price.
customer_reviews.author: TheMadDawg2070

customer_reviews.title: Cool design! worth it@
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design, the sound quality is good, it works well
customer_reviews.author: Cigdem Yilmaz

customer_reviews.title: broken like all the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: opened the brand new sealed box and it was broken just like the other reviews say. guess i should have read them
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Beers

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good, noise cancelling is good
customer_reviews.text: Connects and works perfectly to a Cisco VOIP phone. Have had no microphone issues. Sound quality is good, noise cancelling is good, battery life is good. Takes a bit long to charge and I wish these would cover your entire ear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pissed
customer_reviews.text: I am pissed this is the second pair of head phones that was delivered broken and these looked used 🤬🤬🤬
customer_reviews.author: TeTho

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality was terrible, like listening through a styrofoam cup
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a broken pair but even with the mic turned off, the sound quality was terrible, like listening through a styrofoam cup. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Jz

customer_reviews.title: Can't charge them anymore.
customer_reviews.text: The mini USB port almost never works. It has progressively gotten worse over time. I've had them less than a year and they are now useless.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great headset!
customer_reviews.text: These are great so far! I would recommend them but I would buy these off of someone on Amazon. The noise cancellation is fine but you can hear a little bit of other things. Great headset except the price is a bit too much.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Fong

customer_reviews.title: Probably a good pair of headphones but I had a bad experience
customer_reviews.text: Came broken. Had to return it. Probably a good pair of headphones but I had a bad experience
customer_reviews.author: RossLikeUhHoldOnLetMeThinkBoss

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I took these out of the box , tried them on, and decided to send them back. I found them quite uncomfortable, perhaps because they were too small for my 73/4 size head. They also seemed a bit heavy, and the cushion on the headband is rather hard. I thought they might be good for plane travel, but the large case they come in would not fit easily into my shoulder bag. On the plus side, they seem quite sturdy and would probably withstand hard use. I cannot comment on their sound quality, since I did not listen to them.
customer_reviews.author: Louis M

customer_reviews.title: The best pair of headphones that I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: The best pair of headphones that I have ever had. They are great at noise cancelling. Very easy to pair to devices through Bluetooth. The sound is incredible, including the bass.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Great for mobile gaming comfort but dated technology shows and the mic is awful
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing but mic quality is awful. Whenever I turn my mic on via in-game controls I get wired audio distortion and some teammates have trouble hearing me. Audio latency can be very dramatic at first but you get used to it. Latency is an issue with any Bluetooth headset. Astro needs to update this model with the latest Bluetooth technology. The headphone provides great sound quality, I can hear footstep from further away than any of my teammates. Overall, these headphones are oaky, the benefit is that your comfortable while playing on mobile and can even charge as you play if you're using a newer iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: vectorman_93

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: ordered these twice and both times was sent a broken pair, would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I usually don't like on ears
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't like on ears, but it was hard to beat being customizable and wireless for the price. While they are pretty comfy, they do get a bit heavy and sore after a few hours. Made some custom tags for them though and that turned out surprisingly well. Sound is solid, but not spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the audio that astro provides. You definitely get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Shane T Holuby

customer_reviews.title: I would have gotten a replacement pair....
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had an issue with the headphones so I had to return it. There was a sound issue with the right side. What I can say is that they felt comfortable to wear and the fact that you can put on custom speaker tags is pretty rad. I would have bought them again if my wife didn't get me a different pair of headphones as a present.
customer_reviews.author: double_r

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Hands down the best pair of headphones I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great headset. Simple to use and pair with any ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headset. Simple to use and pair with any device.
customer_reviews.author: Jim O'Halloran

customer_reviews.title: - the noise cancellation cannot be turned off - i ...
customer_reviews.text: - the noise cancellation cannot be turned off - i can actually hear it more than the music - cannot use a wired cable
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Perez-Lopez

product_meta.title: ASTRO Gaming A38 Grey Bluetooth Headset
